quote.text: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.
quote.author: Sun Tzu, The Art of War

descriptions.400: Your request was malformed, yet Sun Tzu teaches: 'In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.' Correct your approach and victory shall be yours.
descriptions.401: You lack the credentials to proceed. Remember: 'Know yourself and you will win all battles.' Authenticate yourself to continue.
descriptions.402: This resource requires payment. As the master said: 'The general who advances without coveting fame and retreats without fearing disgrace is the jewel of the kingdom.'
descriptions.403: Access is forbidden. 'The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.' Perhaps another path exists for you.
descriptions.404: The path you seek does not exist. But as the great strategist teaches us, every obstacle reveals a new path forward. This error is not failure—it is redirection.
descriptions.405: This method is not permitted. 'All warfare is based on deception.' Try a different approach to achieve your objective.
descriptions.406: The format is not acceptable. 'Victorious warriors win first and then go to war.' Prepare your request properly before advancing.
descriptions.408: Time has expired. 'Rapidity is the essence of war.' Yet patience is also wisdom. Try again with swifter execution.
descriptions.409: A conflict has arisen. 'In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.' Resolve the contradiction and find harmony.
descriptions.410: This resource has been removed permanently. 'Let your plans be dark and impenetrable as night, and when you move, fall like a thunderbolt.' Move forward to new goals.
descriptions.413: Your request is too large. 'He who knows when to fight and when not to fight will be victorious.' Reduce your demands.
descriptions.429: You make too many requests. 'Ponder and deliberate before you make a move.' Patience brings clarity; haste brings confusion.
descriptions.500: The server encounters internal chaos. 'In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.' Those who manage the server will restore order.
descriptions.502: The gateway fails to respond correctly. 'Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory.' The connection must be repaired.
descriptions.503: The service is currently unavailable. 'To know when to march and when to rest is the secret of victory.' Return when service resumes.
descriptions.504: The gateway timed out. 'Speed is the essence of war,' yet even the swiftest warrior must wait for the right moment. Try again.
descriptions.default: An error has occurred. Seek opportunity within this chaos.
